text:
Hi there!
I'm trying to display the listings (this is a custom object) that are associated with the contact receiving the email. I managed to do this when I hardcode the contact id, but not when I use contact.id as a variable. Any help would be appreciated! My current code is:

`{% set associated_objects = crm_associations({{ contact.hs_object_id }}, "USER_DEFINED", 2) %}`
`{% for listing in associated_objects.results %}`
`{{ listing.listingname }}`
 `{% endfor %}`
